description: An Apple HealthKit correlation sample that represents data using multiple quantity and category samples.

references.description: The reference for the HKMetadataKeyFoodType metadata key that should be used with correlation samples of type HKCorrelationTypeIdentifierFood.

correlation_type.description: The correlation type for this sample.

samples.description: An array of category and quantity samples that represent all the components of the correlation sample.

effective_time_frame.description: The time frame when this sample occurred. When the HKSample `startDate` and `endDate` values are different, we recommend using the `time_interval` time frame property, and when they are the same, we recommend using the `date_time` time frame property.

metadata.description: When the correlation type is HKCorrelationTypeIdentifierFood, include a metadata item with key HKMetadataKeyFoodType and the name of the food item as its value.
